data.eml:eml: A new species of Trachymyrmex (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) fungus-growing ant from the Sierra Madre Oriental of northeastern Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sanchez-Pena, Sergio R., Chacon-Cardosa, Manuela Citlali, Canales-del-Castillo, Ricardo, Ward, Lauren, Resendez-Perez, Diana (2017): A new species of Trachymyrmex (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) fungus-growing ant from the Sierra Madre Oriental of northeastern Mexico. ZooKeys 706: 73-94, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.706.12539, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.706.12539
